title: How to Delete or Disable a Kik Account: Step-by-Step Guide

steps.title: Ensure you have access to the original email you used to sign up for Kik.
steps.content: Ensure you have access to the original email you used to sign up for Kik. If you don't have access to this email, you won't be able to submit a request to delete your account. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Submit a deletion request with Kik.
steps.content: Submit a deletion request with Kik. Go to Kik's account deletion request form here . Fill in your Kik account username, the original email associated with your Kik account, and the reason you want to delete your account. You must also check the box stating you understand that you're permanently deleting your account. Press Go! to submit the request.

steps.title: Wait for an email from Kik.
steps.content: Wait for an email from Kik. This email contains a link to permanently delete your account. Click the link in the email and follow any on-screen instructions to complete the account deletion process.

steps.title: Ensure you have access to the original email you used to sign up for Kik.
steps.content: Ensure you have access to the original email you used to sign up for Kik. If you don't have access to this email, you won't be able to submit a request to temporarily deactivate your account. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Submit a deactivation request with Kik.
steps.content: Submit a deactivation request with Kik. Go to Kik's account deactivation request form here . Fill in the original email associated with your Kik account and click Go! to submit the request.

steps.title: Wait for an email from Kik.
steps.content: Wait for an email from Kik. This email contains a link to temporarily disable your account. Click the link in the email and follow any on-screen instructions to complete the account deactivation process. To reactivate your account, simply sign back into it.
